instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01521 no power
threads.message:
Arrived with heavy liquid damage from being left out in the rain but surprisingly the board has very little corrosion.

minor corrosion around Q3200 area. Replaced Q3200 and a few capacitors but no changes. No 5v on charger

On pins 2 and 4 of Q3200 I get .200V  Checked all big coils and no shorts. First board we received without the amp meter at least coming on

What should be checked next?

threads.title: 820-01521 no power
threads.message:
So USB-C meter doesn't show anything, nor 5V at least?
In such case, check diode mode to ground at CC1/2 pins of CD3215 chips.

Remove USB-C connector from the shell and clean the pins.
